thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 11 of 1749
thread.title: Melissa

author: Melissa
title: Melissa
text: I just booked for the second time on FlightHub for an international flight and will continue to use their services for future trips of mine! The website is easy to use and understand and has the best prices I have found - and believe me when I say I search around for flight options! The conformation email comes immediately after booking. I also appreciate FlightHubs option to email me when there are price drops on flights that I have been searching.... It's a very convenient option for a busy person like me!
